content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><modsCollection rowCount="1"><mods><identifier type="pw">fs20143083</identifier><identifier type="pwpk">70122362</identifier><identifier type="series">Fact Sheet</identifier><identifier type="seriesNumber">2014-3083</identifier><identifier type="seriesCode">FS</identifier><genre>USGS Numbered Series</genre><titleInfo><title>ShakeAlert: an earthquake early warning system for the United States West Coast</title></titleInfo><originInfo><dateOther>Fri, 29 Aug 2014 16:39 -0500</dateOther><dateIssued>2014</dateIssued><publisher>U.S Geological Survey</publisher><placeTerm>Reston, VA</placeTerm></originInfo><name><namePart>Burkett, Erin R.; Given, Douglas D.; Jones, Lucile M.</namePart><role>Author</role></name><abstract>Earthquake early warning systems use earthquake science and the technology of monitoring systems to alert devices and people when shaking waves generated by an earthquake are expected to arrive at their location. The seconds to minutes of advance warning can allow people and systems to take actions to protect life and property from destructive shaking. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) in collaboration with several partners has been working to develop an early warning system for the United States. ShakeAlert, a demonstration system currently under development, is designed to cover the West Coast States of California, Oregon, and Washington.</abstract><physicalDescription><form>4 p.</form><form>U.S Geological Survey</form><form>Reston, VA</form></physicalDescription><location><url note="INDEX PAGE">http://pubs.usgs.gov/fs/2014/3083/</url><url note="THUMBNAIL">http://pubs.er.usgs.gov/thumbnails/fs20143083.jpg</url><url note="DOCUMENT">http://pubs.usgs.gov/fs/2014/3083/pdf/fs2014-3083.pdf</url></location><note type="citation/reference">ShakeAlert: an earthquake early warning system for the United States West Coast; 2014; FS; 2014-3083; Fact Sheet; Burkett, Erin R.; Given, Douglas D.; Jones, Lucile M.</note><languageTerm>English</languageTerm><relatedItem type="original"><titleInfo><title>Fact Sheet</title></titleInfo></relatedItem></mods></modsCollection>
